author: fielding
msg: Replace the table macros with a tree walk.  This also changes the default
look of table headers, but I like it better this way, and now any of the
defaults can be overridden within the xml.

author: brian
msg: Note that xml-xalan/c has been covered, did some realphabetization and removed a redundancy.

author: fielding
msg: Clean up the project file and macros so that
- content is not hiding within attributes
- item text can be marked-up however you like
- menu titles are now elements and can have href attributes
- project name removed because it was redundant and unused

author: fielding
msg: section is now completely recursive.  It would have been cool to have
the banner colors be an array, but I couldn't figure out a way to index
it using level.  Well, it's safer this way anyhow.
